Edges-Mystic Theurge -- Female Human Heroic Mystic Theurge
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Language (Common): (sma) d8 Repair: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d8
Boating: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Performance: (spi) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Common
Skill Notes:
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Thin Skinned+: -4 vs. Taunt
Work The Room: Roll additional Performance or Persuasion die in Support 1/rd
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Irori (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 12; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (10 points): Cleric: 1; Mystic Theurge II: 1; Mystic Theurge III: 1; Mystic Theurge: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 2; Steady Hands: 1; Wizard: 1; Work The Room: 1 Hindrances: Driven; Jealous; Thin Skinned+ Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Bond: +1 Edge Points (Bonded Object or Familiar)
Cleric: Has Arcane Background (Cleric), Domain, Channel Energy, and Vow+ features
Domain: +1 Edge Points (domain)
Mystic Theurge II: Has Spell Synergy feature
Mystic Theurge III: Has Spell Synthesis feature
Mystic Theurge: Has Combined Spells feature
Wizard: Has Arcane Background (Wizard), Arcane Bond, Armor Interference, School, and Spellbooks features
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
School: May select specialist school (free casting reroll) and two opposition schools (-2 casting rolls)
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Hand Axe (d8+d6 R3"); Long Sword (d8+d8); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Steady Hands: No penalty for shot from unstable platform; reduces running shot penalty by 1
Arcana
Power Count: 8 Power Points: 30
Powers:
Barrier: (2 PP Conj) R6" Creates a 5" long (Raise 10") by 1" high wall for 5 rd (+1/+2 PP Barrier inflicts 2d4/2d6 damage; +1 PP Barrier has +2 hardness; +1 PP Shapes barrier; +1 PP Creates 10"x2" barrier)
Darksight: (1 PP Tran) R6" Target ignores 4 points (Raise 6 points) of illumination penalties for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target ignores all illumination penalties and 4 points from invisibility)
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP Divi) R6" Target can detect supernatural effects (Raise also type) for 5 rd or conceals target aura (Detect neg) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Senses supernatural evil/good; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Identifies magic item powers; +1 PP Detect-2)
Fear: (2 PP Necr) R6" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2, fear table +2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts Spirit-2 on Fear (Raise -4))
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Restores 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Scrying: (3 PP Divi) RSelf Self sees chosen target (-2 unfamiliar target, Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP Shares vision with allies in 6" radius)
Shape Change: (3+ PP Tran) RSelf transforms into animal form (Raise +1 Strength and Vigor) for 5 rd (+1 PP Effects last 5 min; +2/+3 PP Effect willing target at range touch/6")
Slumber: (2 PP Ench) R6" Target sleeps (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2) for 1 hr (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Stun: (2 PP Evoc) R6" Stuns target (Vigor neg; Raise Vigor-2) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Cleric): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Wizard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +10 Power Points
Channel Energy: May cast Healing at R6"; additional targets cost 1 Power Point each
Combined Spells: May cast two spells simultaneously
Spell Synergy: Using Combined Spells feature reduces spell cost by 1 Power Point (min 1) each
Spell Synthesis: May apply class edge abilities to all spells
Spellbooks: Must study bonded arcane book daily to cast spells
